effect.full: This Pokémon is immune to ground-type moves, spikes, toxic spikes, and arena trap. This ability is disabled during gravity or ingrain, or while holding an iron ball. This ability is not disabled during roost.

description.diamond-pearl: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.platinum: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.heartgold-soulsilver: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.black-white: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.black-2-white-2: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.x-y: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Gives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.sun-moon: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
description.sword-shield: By floating in the air, the Pokémon receives full immunity to all Ground-type moves.
